about_paragraph: The Yemeni Students Union in Hungary is a student organization dedicated to serving Yemeni students across the country and providing them with both academic and social support. The Union strives to strengthen cooperation and solidarity among students while organizing cultural, educational, social, and sporting activities that foster personal growth and preserve national identity. It also represents Yemeni students before official institutions and universities in Hungary, advocates for their rights, and assists newcomers in adapting to university life and the local environment. Furthermore, the Union seeks to build bridges of understanding and collaboration between the Yemeni student community and Hungarian society, promoting cultural exchange and mutual respect.

termsAndConditions:
By creating an account, you agree to:
1. Provide accurate information.
2. Use this platform lawfully.
3. Respect others’ privacy.
4. Not impersonate another user.
5. Allow updates to these terms as needed.
privacyPolicy:
We value your privacy.
1. We collect minimal data.
2. We never sell user data.
3. You can delete your info anytime.
4. Cookies improve the experience.
5. By using this site, you agree to our data practices.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using the Guysh Hungary Student Union platform, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

section2.title: User Accounts
section2.content: To access certain features of our platform, you must register for an account. When creating an account, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
Maintain the security of your password and identification
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
Be responsible for all activities that occur under your account

section3.title: User Conduct
section3.content: You agree not to use the platform to:
items: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Infringe upon the rights of others
Transmit any harmful or malicious content
Impersonate any person or entity
Interfere with or disrupt the platform's functionality

section4.title: Intellectual Property
section4.content: All content on this platform, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Guysh Hungary Student Union or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without explicit permission.

section5.title: Limitation of Liability
section5.content: Guysh Hungary Student Union shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use the service. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free.

section6.title: Modifications to Terms
section6.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through a notice on our platform. Your continued use of the service after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information
privacy.introduction: Guysh Hungary Student Union is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
Student information (university, student ID, program of study)
Profile information and preferences
Communications and correspondence with us

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process your registration and manage your account
Send you updates, newsletters, and event notifications
Respond to your comments, questions, and requests
Analyze usage patterns and optimize user experience

section3.title: Data Security
section3.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section4.title: Information Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With your explicit consent
To comply with legal obligations
To protect our rights and safety
With service providers who assist in our operations (under strict confidentiality agreements)

section5.title: Your Rights
items: Access and review your personal information
Request corrections to your data
Request deletion of your account and data
Opt-out of marketing communications
Withdraw consent for data processing

section6.title: Changes to This Policy
section6.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

union.title: Student Union Rules and Rights
union.subtitle: Understanding your rights and responsibilities as a member of Guysh Hungary Student Union
union.introduction: The Guysh Hungary Student Union is dedicated to supporting Yemeni students in Hungary. This document outlines the rights, responsibilities, and rules that govern our union and its members.

items.title: Right to Representation
items.description: Every member has the right to fair representation and to have their voice heard in union matters and decisions affecting the student community.

items.title: Right to Participate
items.description: Members have the right to participate in all union activities, events, and elections, and to vote on important decisions.

items.title: Right to Support Services
items.description: Access to academic support, career guidance, legal assistance, and welfare services provided by the union.

items.title: Right to Information
items.description: Members have the right to receive timely information about union activities, policies, and services available to them.

items.title: Right to Equal Treatment
items.description: All members are entitled to equal treatment regardless of their university, program of study, or personal background.

items.title: Respect and Integrity
items.description: Members must treat fellow students, union staff, and the broader community with respect and maintain the highest standards of personal integrity.

items.title: Active Participation
items.description: Members are encouraged to actively participate in union activities and contribute to the betterment of the student community.

items.title: Compliance with Rules
items.description: Members must comply with all union rules, policies, and the laws of Hungary and their respective educational institutions.

items.title: Financial Obligations
items.description: Members should fulfill any financial obligations, including membership fees or event contributions, in a timely manner.

items.title: Positive Representation
items.description: Members should represent the union and their community positively in all interactions and maintain the union's reputation.

items.title: Airport Pickup Service
items.description: Assistance with arrival and transportation from the airport to accommodation.

items.title: Academic Support
items.description: Tutoring, study groups, and academic counseling services.

items.title: Cultural Events
items.description: Organization of cultural celebrations and community gatherings.

items.title: Legal Assistance
items.description: Guidance on visa matters, housing contracts, and legal rights.

items.title: Career Development
items.description: Career fairs, workshops, and networking opportunities.

items.title: Social Integration
items.description: Programs to help students integrate into Hungarian society.

benefits.title: Membership Benefits
items: Access to exclusive events and workshops
Networking opportunities with fellow Yemeni students
Priority registration for union services
Discounts on cultural events and activities
Access to the union's resource library
Mentorship programs connecting new and senior students
Emergency support and assistance when needed
Voice in union decision-making processes

conduct.title: Code of Conduct
conduct.content: All members must adhere to the following code of conduct:
items: Respect the diversity of the student community
Maintain confidentiality of sensitive information
Refrain from discriminatory or harassing behavior
Use union resources responsibly and ethically
Report any violations of union rules or policies
Support fellow students in their academic and personal endeavors

contact.title: Questions or Concerns?
contact.content: If you have any questions about these rules and rights, or if you need assistance, please contact us at:
